name: FIREWALK
description:
Someone has hacked the upper disk, unleashing a dangerous virus. As a FIREWALKER, it is your job to defend the lower disk against this incursion for as long as possible.

This game was created for the 2022 Epic MegaJam. Every aspect of it - every texture, sound effect, blueprint script, everything - was created during the jam window. Even the logo used in the loading splash screen was newly created for this project.
